widget.name: Tag Selector
widget.description: Pluggable Mendix widget to select/delete/create objects and assign them to an existing object.

property.caption: TagNPE Label
property.description: Label attribute of the TagNPE.

property.caption: guid
property.description: guid of the context object.

property.caption: microflow
property.description: microflow to execute

property.caption: inputValue
property.description: input value when user types.

property.caption: Select tag microflow
property.description: Microflow to be executed a tag is selected.

property.caption: Create tag microflow
property.description: Microflow to be executed a new tag is added.

property.caption: Remove tag microflow
property.description: Microflow to be executed when a tag is deleted.

property.caption: Remove all tags microflow
property.description: Microflow to be executed when all tags should be deleted.

property.caption: Current tags
property.description: Get all the current tags.

property.caption: Current tags label
property.description: The label attribute of the tag object.

property.caption: Tag suggestions
property.description: All the tags you want to suggest as options.

property.caption: Tag suggestions label
property.description: The label attribute of the tag suggestions object.

property.caption: Enable Create
property.description: Enable the Tag Selector to create tags when none are found.

property.caption: On change
property.description: on change microflow to trigger when the input is changed

property.caption: useDefaultStyle
property.description: Do you want to use the default styling?

property.caption: Placeholder
property.description: Placeholder text for when there are no labels.

property.caption: CustomCreatePrefix
property.description: The line of text that will appear in the dropdown menu when creating a new tag.

property.caption: ClassName
property.description: Custom class name.

property.caption: ClassNamePrefix
property.description: Custom Class name prefix.

property.caption: Animated Delete
property.description: Animation while deleting a tag.
